name: JLNKHeresYourFreakin'VideoGame
description:
The “Here’s Your Freakin Video Game” is an action sidescroller platform game starring Jason Lee and Kluck from 103.9 The Bear with custom audio commentary by JLNK throughout all levels that will encourage and discourage the player through comedy and fun.

Game Objective: Choose either Jason Lee or Kluck as the player and make it through all the levels completing different challenges, collect special coins, health points and defeat the enemies.
